name: sindex-website
description: Sinister Dexter band website with image processing

scripts.build:images: npm run convert-heic && npm run process-images
scripts.build: npm run build:images && npm run build:html && npm run optimize
scripts.build:force: npm run convert-heic && npm run process-images:force && npm run build:html
scripts.serve: cd public && python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
